title: Der Abend application font
content:
Hello,

Could you help me with identifying the serif font used in the image? (guten abend, frau.hase)  
And it would be lovely if you can also find the Sans serif used for the body text.

Many thanks,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SPIEGEL_-_Der_Abend_2013_on_Behance_-_2014-03-06_23_4558.36.33.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SPIEGEL_-_Der_Abend_2013_on_Behance_-_2014-03-06_23_4907.35.49.png)

Font: 

 FB Zocalo 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: aviv

comments.content: May be GF Freight [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-text) or [Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-display) for the serif and [FF Super Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk) for the sans.

I don't think the serif italic is Freight. The letter shapes are not the same to my eye.  
Italics are a hard thing to ID, but I am looking.

- Mike Yanega
You were right Mike. I digged a bit more and now I think it's [FB Zocalo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062339/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/zocalo).

That's it! Good work Ryuk.

- Mike Yanega
